family.name: taxes
family.description:
Taxes describe the amount of tax owing for orders, shipments and shipment lineitems.
[orders]: #orders

resource.name: order-tax
resource.description: A tax resource that identifies the tax owing for an order.

resource.name: shipment-tax
resource.description: A tax resource that identifies the tax paid for a shipment.

relationship.name: taxes-for-order
relationship.description: Retrieves the total tax for an order, which includes the order's tax amount, currency, and type of tax (VAT, HST, etc.).

relationship.name: taxes-for-shipment
relationship.description: Retrieves the total tax for a shipment, which includes the shipments' tax amount, currency, and type of tax (VAT, HST, etc.).

relationship.name: taxes-for-shipment-line-item
relationship.description: Retrieve the tax amount for a shipment line item.
